io.lettuce.core.dynamic.codec

类 AnnotationRedisCodecResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.dynamic.codec.AnnotationRedisCodecResolver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RedisCodecResolver

    public class AnnotationRedisCodecResolver
extends Object
implements RedisCodecResolver
    Annotation-based RedisCodecResolver. Considers @Key and @Value annotations of method parameters to determine a RedisCodec that is able to handle all involved types.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    另请参阅:
    Key, Value

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected static class  AnnotationRedisCodecResolver.ParameterWrappers
      Parameter wrapper support for types that encapsulate one or more parameter values.

      Creates a new AnnotationRedisCodecResolver given a List of RedisCodecs.

      • resolve

        public RedisCodec<?,?> resolve(CommandMethod commandMethod)
        从接口复制的说明: RedisCodecResolver
        Resolve a RedisCodec for the given CommandMethod.
        指定者:
        resolve 在接口中 RedisCodecResolver
        参数:
        commandMethod - must not be null.
        返回:
        the resolved RedisCodec or null if not resolvable.
